programme.title: Pure Design: Helen & Niall's Nursery
programme.desc: Homeowners Helen and Niall are getting nervous - they're a few short months away from the birth of their first child and their never-renovated 1920s home doesn't contain a nursery. Both work full time - so they're relying on designer Samantha Pynn to create a bright and practical room for their new bundle of joy.

programme.title: Pure Design: Lindsay's Teenage Bedroom
programme.desc: Designer Samantha Pynn creates an eco-fabulous bedroom for 16-year-old Lindsay that perfectly balances youthful without looking childish - and still allows for room to grow.

programme.title: Pure Design: Carolyn & Derek's Attic Loft
programme.desc: Designer Samantha Pynn transforms an unimaginative third floor loft into a fun, colorful, bohemian-inspired family room that matches homeowners Carolyn and Derek's personalities.

programme.title: Pure Design: Ania & Walter's Master Bedroom
programme.desc: Too much space is not always a good thing, but with a little planning, designer Samantha Pynn is able to transform Ania and Walter's vast bedroom into a luxurious, earth-friendly boudoir.

programme.title: Pure Design: Liliana and Frank's Living/Dining Room
programme.desc: Frank and Liliana's 1930s home gets fast-forwarded to the 21st century as designer Samantha Pynn uses environmentally friendly furniture and fresh accessories to update the look of classic English Revival.

programme.title: Pure Design: Virginia's Kitchen
programme.desc: The cottage-style charm that Virginia fell in love with when she bought her city home has lost its appeal. Designer Samantha Pynn takes it from outdated to 'Modern Country' - with an eco-twist.

programme.title: Pure Design: Tiffany's Bedroom
programme.desc: For many first-time homeowners, decorating - especially private spaces like the bedroom - is definitely last on the list. That's certainly the case for Tiffany, an up and coming PR executive. By refreshing some of Tiffany's vintage furniture and bringing in some modern pieces and sustainable choices, host Samantha Pynn takes Tiffany's dorm-like bedroom with its mish-mash of furnishings and transforms it into an eclectic and soothing space, full of the sophistication a professional woman deserves.

programme.title: The Wood Whisperer: A Better Way to Apply Oil Finishes!
programme.desc: Applying oil finishes sparingly is the key to avoiding problems with curing and other flaws in the surface.

programme.title: The Wood Whisperer: Backlit LED Poster Frame Light Box
programme.desc: Nicole and I love movies and we are lucky to have our own home theater room. Just outside that room, is a recess with an outlet on the wall intended for a back-lit poster frame. The one that came with the house was made with fluorescent tubes and was falling apart. So this is my replacement. It features a dimmable LED light strip and a double-sided poster and accEPts 27″ x 40″ posters.

programme.title: The Wood Whisperer: A Sweet Bandsaw Upgrade
programme.desc: A close look at the installation and use of the Laguna DriftMaster Fence System.

programme.title: The Wood Whisperer: A Simple Frame and Panel
programme.desc: I'm currently working on an Executive Desk that features large panels on the sides and front. I pondered the various ways to construct the panels along with the rails and legs that would comprise the "frame" and ultimately decided on a very simple solution: face-gluing the rails to the panels.

programme.title: The Wood Whisperer: Oil-Based Finish Basics
programme.desc: Oil-based finishes are typically the first type of finish we confront as woodworkers, be it straight oil or a can polyurethane. Although they are all derived from oil, these finishes can vary widely in terms of application method, durability, and maintenance. The key to understanding these finishes is to understand their ingredients.

programme.title: The Wood Whisperer: My New Assembly Table
programme.desc: This video was recording live on 9/14/11. My goal was to discuss my new torsion box assembly table and what makes it different from the original Torsion Box Assembly Table. To be perfectly frank, the differences weren't great enough to justify making this project into a new video series. But I thought you would enjoy getting a look at some of the minor changes.

programme.title: The Wood Whisperer: 60 Seconds to Sharp
programme.desc: Most videos about sharpening, including my own, focus on how to tune up an old tool or properly set a new one. Thankfully, once you do that process it isn't likely you'll have to do it again for a very long time. From that point on, you'll be sharpening in maintenance mode.

programme.title: The Wood Whisperer: 6 Tips for Better Shop Layout!
programme.desc: Need help setting up your shop? Check out these six shop layout tips!

programme.title: The Flying Chef: Raja Ampat
programme.desc: Located in the heart of the "Coral Triangle" Raja Ampat is the most biologically diverse marine region in the world and here Chef Nathan cooks local delicacies made from Mussels and Papeda.

programme.title: The Flying Chef: Alor
programme.desc: The island of Alor is a place where coastal fishing villages trade seafood for meat, fruit and vegetables from the farming villages. Chef Nathan prepared fresh Tuna sashimi.

programme.title: The Flying Chef: Gili Islands
programme.desc: Experience a tropical oasis enriched by the stunning backdrop of Indonesia's Ringani volcano. On the water Chef Nathan cooks fish and Porchetta.

programme.title: The Flying Chef: Kalimaya
programme.desc: Located near the Komodo National Park, we discover one of Indonesia's best kept diving secrets at the base of an active volcano! Nathan also prepares barbecue chicken with grilled vegetables

programme.title: The Flying Chef: Lembeh
programme.desc: Discover one of the world's best macro diving sites and get up close to some unique creatures at the Tangkoko Nature Reserve. Chef Nathan Huxham prepares his spicy Lembeh lobster dish.

programme.title: The Flying Chef: Bira Dive Camp
programme.desc: Located on the southern tip of South Sulawesi is Indonesia's boat building capital. Chef Nathan cooks up some mouth-watering Bira Island prawns and fish.

programme.title: Jewelry Stars by Sugar Gay Isber: Bam Bam Necklace
programme.desc: Sugar Gay creates a necklace out of landscape glass rocks.

programme.title: Jewelry Stars by Sugar Gay Isber: Black Drop Necklace
programme.desc: Sugar Gay makes bead caps on drops to make a necklace.

programme.title: Jewelry Stars by Sugar Gay Isber: Blue Earrings
programme.desc: Sugar Gay demos how to create blue sparkle earrings.

programme.title: Jewelry Stars by Sugar Gay Isber: Shark's Tooth Necklace
programme.desc: Sugar Gay creates a necklace out of landscape glass rocks

programme.title: Jewelry Stars by Sugar Gay Isber: 55 Black & White Cameos Necklace
programme.desc: Sugar Gay shows how to make a big black and white statement necklace.

programme.title: Jewelry Stars by Sugar Gay Isber: Green Stain Glass Cuff Bracelet
programme.desc: Sugar Gay uses resin and glass beads to make a beautiful cuff bracelet.

programme.title: Jewelry Stars by Sugar Gay Isber: Crystal Chrome Drop Necklace
programme.desc: Sugar Gay makes necklaces fit for any rock and roll star.

programme.title: Jewelry Stars by Sugar Gay Isber: Bloody Bug Bracelet Halloween
programme.desc: Sugar Gay uses some creepy crawly bugs to make unique jewelry.

programme.title: Jewelry Stars by Sugar Gay Isber: Stained Glass Collection Gold Drops
programme.desc: Sugar Gay makes some stained glass inspired jewelry.

programme.title: Jewelry Stars by Sugar Gay Isber: Playing with Marbles
programme.desc: Sugar Gay creates amazing jewelry and decorations with colorful marbles.

programme.title: Jewelry Stars by Sugar Gay Isber: Beaded Cuff Bracelet
programme.desc: Sugar Gay makes a unique beaded cuff bracelet.

programme.title: Jewelry Stars by Sugar Gay Isber: Glass Pendant
programme.desc: Sugar Gay creates a unique and shiny glass pendant.

programme.title: Jewelry Stars by Sugar Gay Isber: Blue Bracelet
programme.desc: Sugar Gay makes a beautiful blue bracelet. It will go well with her handmade blue earrings!

programme.title: Jewelry Stars by Sugar Gay Isber: Jewelry Display
programme.desc: Sugar Gay creates colorful jewelry display stands out of silicone.

programme.title: Jewelry Stars by Sugar Gay Isber: Malachite Disk Pendant
programme.desc: Sugar Gay makes an amazing disk pendant out of malachite.

programme.title: Jewelry Stars by Sugar Gay Isber: Plaid Shark Tooth
programme.desc: Sugar Gay creates a colorful necklace out of a big shark tooth.

programme.title: Jewelry Stars by Sugar Gay Isber: Resin Beach Wedding Necklace
programme.desc: Sugar Gay makes a necklace for a wedding on a sunny beach.

programme.title: Jewelry Stars by Sugar Gay Isber: Stained Glass Mobile
programme.desc: Sugar Gay creates amazing stained glass decorations.

programme.title: Jewelry Stars by Sugar Gay Isber: Rainbow Crystal Pendant
programme.desc: Sugar Gay makes a crystal pendant with all the colors of the rainbow.

programme.title: Jewelry Stars by Sugar Gay Isber: Star of David Suncatcher
programme.desc: Sugar Gay creates a gorgeous star of David sun-catcher.

programme.title: Jewelry Stars by Sugar Gay Isber: Ornament Earrings
programme.desc: Sugar Gay makes gorgeous ornament earrings.

programme.title: Jewelry Stars by Sugar Gay Isber: Cookie Tin
programme.desc: Sugar Gay makes a beautiful holiday themed cookie tin.

programme.title: Jewelry Stars by Sugar Gay Isber: Iced Ornaments
programme.desc: Sugar Gay makes a beautiful iced ornaments.

programme.desc: Learn how to make fabric belts, perfect hems, and flat felted seams! And a bonus - your guide into cutting buttonholes.

programme.desc: Update your wardrobe! Learn how to topstitch and change pocket angles.
